pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:0.5: 5. The training rule on exchanging for something else
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.3: A lay follower went to her and asked,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.4: “I hope you’re bearing up, Venerable, I hope you’re getting better?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.5: “I’m not bearing up, and I’m not getting better.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.6: “We’ll deposit a _kahāpaṇa_ coin in such-and-such a shop. Please get whatever you wish from there.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.7: Thullanandā then said to a trainee nun,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.8: “Go to such-and-such a shop and bring back a _kahāpaṇa_’s worth of oil.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.9: That trainee nun did just that and gave it to Thullanandā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.11: “I don’t need oil; I need ghee.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.12: The trainee nun returned to the shopkeeper and said,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.13: “It seems the nun doesn’t need oil, but ghee. Here’s your oil; please give me ghee.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.14: “Venerable, if we were to take back goods that have been sold, when would our goods be sold?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.15: When oil is bought, oil is taken away. Buying ghee, you receive that, and you’ll take that away.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.16: The trainee nun started to cry.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.19: and she told them what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.20: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.21: “How could Venerable Thullanandā get one thing in exchange and then something else?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.22: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.25: “How could the nun Thullanandā get one thing in exchange and then something else?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.27: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.28.1: ‘If a nun gets one thing in exchange and then something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.8: apart from that thing, if she gets something else in exchange, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.9: When she gets it, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.10: It is to be relinquished to a sangha, a group, or an individual nun.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.11: “And, monks, it’s to be relinquished like this.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.12: (To be expanded as in Nuns’ Relinquishment 1, [](pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.21--2.1.43), with appropriate substitutions.)
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.13: … ‘Venerables, this thing, which I got in exchange, having first got something else in exchange, is to be relinquished. I relinquish it to the Sangha.’ …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.17.1: If it is something else and she perceives it as such, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.18: If it is something else, but she is unsure of it, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.19: If it is something else, but she does not perceive it as such, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.20: If it is not something else, but she perceives it as such, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.21: If it is not something else, but she is unsure of it, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.22: If it is not something else, and she does not perceive it as such, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.24: if she gets both in exchange at the same time;
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.25: if she can show a benefit in doing the exchange;
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.27: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.28: The fifth training rule is finished.
